name: Don't Get Greedy
description:
A simple platformer about balancing the need for perks and your mobility.

  • Use A + D to move and Space to jump
  • Use Q to go back to the last checkpoint
  • Every coin you pick up slows you down as the weight of gold ways you down

This game was made for the BlackThornProd Game Jam #3 and was made in 1 week. All the code, sounds, art and assets were made by 2, 13 year olds.

We hope you enjoy!
